metadata.title: CVE-2023-2088 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in OpenStack due to an inconsistency between Cinder andNova. This issue can be triggered intentionally or by accident. A remote,authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability by detaching one oftheir volumes from Cinder. The highest impact is to confidentiality.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-2088` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cinder-api - 2:20.2.0-0ubuntu1.1
cinder-backup - 2:20.2.0-0ubuntu1.1
cinder-common - 2:20.2.0-0ubuntu1.1
cinder-scheduler - 2:20.2.0-0ubuntu1.1
cinder-volume - 2:20.2.0-0ubuntu1.1
python3-cinder - 2:20.2.0-0ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

ironic-api - 1:20.1.0-0ubuntu1.1
ironic-common - 1:20.1.0-0ubuntu1.1
ironic-conductor - 1:20.1.0-0ubuntu1.1
python3-ironic - 1:20.1.0-0ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

nova-ajax-console-proxy - 3:25.1.1-0ubuntu1.1
nova-api - 3:25.1.1-0ubuntu1.1
nova-api-metadata - 3:25.1.1-0ubuntu1.1
nova-api-os-compute - 3:25.1.1-0ubuntu1.1
nova-api-os-volume - 3:25.1.1-0ubuntu1.1
nova-cells - 3:25.1.1-0ubuntu1.1
nova-common - 3:25.1.1-0ubuntu1.1
nova-compute - 3:25.1.1-0ubuntu1.1
nova-compute-ironic - 3:25.1.1-0ubuntu1.1
nova-compute-kvm - 3:25.1.1-0ubuntu1.1
nova-compute-libvirt - 3:25.1.1-0ubuntu1.1
nova-compute-lxc - 3:25.1.1-0ubuntu1.1
nova-compute-qemu - 3:25.1.1-0ubuntu1.1
nova-compute-vmware - 3:25.1.1-0ubuntu1.1
nova-compute-xen - 3:25.1.1-0ubuntu1.1
nova-conductor - 3:25.1.1-0ubuntu1.1
nova-novncproxy - 3:25.1.1-0ubuntu1.1
nova-scheduler - 3:25.1.1-0ubuntu1.1
nova-serialproxy - 3:25.1.1-0ubuntu1.1
nova-spiceproxy - 3:25.1.1-0ubuntu1.1
nova-volume - 3:25.1.1-0ubuntu1.1
python3-nova - 3:25.1.1-0ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

python3-glance-store - 3.0.0-0ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

os-brick-common - 5.2.2-0ubuntu1.2
python3-os-brick - 5.2.2-0ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cinder package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:20.2.0-0ubuntu1.1').
ironic package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:20.1.0-0ubuntu1.1').
nova package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3:25.1.1-0ubuntu1.1').
python-glance-store package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.0.0-0ubuntu1.3').
python-os-brick package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.2.2-0ubuntu1.2').
